description:
Most Popular Countdown app on WebOS - Winner of palms Hot Apps.****************************
We listened to your feedback so far and have incorporated some of them, and working hard to add more! We have made the time drop downs easier to read, changed the alert sound so it can be heard easier and added the ability to have custom sound play. ************************************** From the makers of Easy Stopwatch, Easy Countdown Timer. This application is a countdown timer that allows you to customize warnings and how you are notified. Check back for update frequently as we are looking to add  full screen timer view and more. If you have Ideas send them to support@engineequalscar.com
